visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the following specifications: Chart type: spline, Chart title: Monthly Average Temperature, Axes and labels styling: Use a dark blue color for the title, a light blue color for the x-axis labels, and a green color for the y-axis labels. Font size for all labels should be 12px. Data series: The series should be named 'Temperature' and contain the data provided in the JavaScript code. Custom colors: Use a gradient from light blue to dark blue for the series. Additional configurations: Set the chart background to a light gray color, add a legend with the series name, and set the chart margins to 50 pixels on all sides.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The title is styled with a dark blue color and is positioned to the right and slightly off the chart area. The x-axis labels are styled with a light blue color, and the y-axis labels are styled with a green color, both with a font size of 12px. The data series is named 'Temperature' and includes the monthly temperature data. The series color is set to a gradient from light blue to dark blue. The chart background is set to a light gray color, and the chart margins are set to 50 pixels on all sides. A legend is enabled to display the series name.
